short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An online office supply inventory checker to help you find it easy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Finding a product in-stock at your favorite easy office supply store can be a daunting task. This extension helps to make that task easier with no fuss and digging around.

This extension only works for Staples® local stores. All that is required are the product's SKU number and your nearest zip code. It also helps you remember past product searches and nearby zip codes.

Buy local and support your favorite office supply store. Be the top bargain hunter in your area. 

PERMISSIONS NEEDED

"Access your data on *.staples.com" 

In order to show product search results and nearby stores with inventory, we need to load data from staples.com 

It does not access any secured page, or read data from pages directly.
